at.jku.se.chatserver

Class ChatServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.jku.se.chatserver.ChatServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerListener, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ChatServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, ServerListener
    Server side chat mechanism. The run method waits for client connections. One a client is connected, a ClientTread object is generated. The standard port of the chat is 2222
    Author:
    martin
